verses.roman:
ei śloke kṛṣṇa-prema kare upadeśa
kṛṣṇera virahe bhaktera bhāva-viśeṣa

synonyms: ei śloke—in this verse; kṛṣṇa-prema—love of Kṛṣṇa; kare upadeśa—instructs; kṛṣṇera virahe—by feeling separation from Kṛṣṇa; bhaktera—of the devotee; bhāva-viśeṣa—transcendental situation.
translation: In this verse Mādhavendra Purī instructs how to achieve ecstatic love for Kṛṣṇa. By feeling separation from Kṛṣṇa, one becomes spiritually situated.
